Posts.EditableText: The game should be the best possible with as much detail, plot, and complexity as possible. If the game looks like it was slapped together in under a month (or 2, or 3) then it will not only make the game and creator look bad, but is also an insult to the books and movies. If you do plan to make this game, please, PLEASE, do a good job. Learn ASL as much as possible before attempting a feat such as this. Don't get me wrong, it's a great idea, but I've seen many LOTR games and I can say for a fact that none of them have been any good (with the exception of the PS2 games). Please consider this.
